<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this represents an inlined call site, then ParentFuncIdPlusOne will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the parent function id plus one. If this represents a normal function,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// then there is no parent, and ParentFuncIdPlusOne will be FunctionSentinel.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this struct is an unallocated slot in the function info vector, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// ParentFuncIdPlusOne will be zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mccvfunctioninfo/#a6501b119f7ba7b15237d1f43dd16ccbc"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mccvfunctioninfo/#a6501b119f7ba7b15237d1f43dd16ccbc">ParentFuncIdPlusOne</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mccvfunctioninfo/#a483f476cd95fc83549dce653648091bbab32b95a936d6a5df6c580b24b5a4b1f1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  enum : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mccvfunctioninfo/#a483f476cd95fc83549dce653648091bbab32b95a936d6a5df6c580b24b5a4b1f1">FunctionSentinel</a> = ~0U &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
